text_cards.caption: TETRAHEDRON
text_cards.description: Separate the four boards, assuming walls in between. You may use a move to teleport to a different board in the same XY position.

text_cards.caption: FREE BIRD
text_cards.description: The silver robot moves for free.

text_cards.caption: DIAGONALS
text_cards.description: The silver robot only moves diagonally. The move is affected by three spaces: the space is passes through directly and the two it crosses diagonally.

text_cards.caption: AGENT SMITH
text_cards.description: The silver may exchange positions with another robot. This counts as one move. For each of the robots adjacent to a wall, increase the move count by one.

text_cards.caption: TRADING PLACES
text_cards.description: The silver robot may trade places with another robot. This counts as two moves.

text_cards.caption: DUB STEP
text_cards.description: All non-target robots only move one space.

text_cards.caption: STUTTER STEP
text_cards.description: The silver robot may stop anywhere suring its move, but my not move again thereafter.

text_cards.caption: KING FOR A DAY
text_cards.description: The silver robot moves like a orthodox chess king, but may not jump over walls.

text_cards.caption: BEAM ME UP SCOTTY!
text_cards.description: The silver robot may be beamed to any square once.

text_cards.caption: FORCE FIELD
text_cards.description: The silver robot may turn on a force field that affects the eight squares around it turning them into solid walls.

text_cards.caption: MERCIFUL ROBOT
text_cards.description: The silver robot only be moved by players with the fewest target tokens

text_cards.caption: MIDAS TOUCH
text_cards.description: The target robot must ricochet off the silver robot en route to the target.

text_cards.caption: SUMO WRESTLING
text_cards.description: Robot may push another robot any number of squares before ricocheting.

text_cards.caption: GRAVITY ASSIST
text_cards.description: Robots may circularly move in the eight squares around another robot as part of a single move.

text_cards.caption: ONE-WAY WALLS
text_cards.description: Robots do not ricochet off of walls when heading towards another board square.

text_cards.caption: TAG
text_cards.description: After robots collide, both my be moved simultaneously on ensuing turns.

text_cards.caption: VERTICAL STACK
text_cards.description: Lay boards in a row. You may use a move to go up or down a board in the same position.

text_cards.caption: SIMD
text_cards.description: The same instruction is given to all robots.

text_cards.caption: MAYBE(SIMD)
text_cards.description: The same instruction may be given to all robots.

text_cards.caption: SILVER SURFER
text_cards.description: The silver robot must touch another robot that moved.
Rotate all boards 180 degrees.

text_cards.caption: HOLES
text_cards.description: Mark a hole on each board. Robots may not pass over holes.

text_cards.caption: TELEPORT
text_cards.description: A robot may teleport between any two locations of the same color as a move.

text_cards.caption: NINJAS
text_cards.description: You may use a move to pass through a wall.
